Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 40th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/14/2015, off Patricia Schmidt (SEA)...
Earned first career win on 4/14/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/6/2015 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/21/2016 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/5/2016 with a Spasms Back, out for 6 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/24/2017 to a 4-year deal worth $7,950,000 per year...
Traded from Montreal to San Francisco on 2/12/2018 (Going to SF: P Martin Sherrard. Going to MON: CF Ezra Delao, P Bill Freeman, 2B Jose Herrera)...
